name: openfaas-helm-chart
description: Forked version openfaas Helm Chart for Magda
author: Jacky Jiang <jacky.jiang@data61.csiro.au>

scripts.add-all-chart-version-changes: git ls-files -m | grep Chart.yaml | xargs git add && git ls-files -m | grep Chart.lock | xargs git add
scripts.add-all-helm-docs-changes: yarn helm-docs && git ls-files -m | grep -i readme.md | xargs git add
scripts.version: yarn update-helm-chart-version && yarn update-all-charts && yarn add-all-chart-version-changes && yarn add-all-helm-docs-changes
